comment._content: Quite the hand-tinting on this one - the detailed work is remarkable.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Yes and the digitisation doesn't show the gilding on the dress, unfortunately
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 7912554@N05
comment._content: These images are always more beautiful in person - the scans never seem to live up to the originals.  Apart from the details of the dress, which must have taken a long time to complete, the delicate flesh tones were expertly done as well.  The photographer was quite gifted, or employed an artist who was.

comment.author: 41182856@N04
comment._content: This is a great (albeit slightly odd) photograph
